iwniXhEelnc.title: Bad Kissers, Bottoming, Relationships | On The Alaskan King Bed with Rob Anderson
iwniXhEelnc.author: Rob Anderson
iwniXhEelnc.description:
I'm back! I've pulled some of your questions about gay sex, dating, and relationships from The Heartthrob Collective, my newsletter. I'll be putting out a new video every month. If you have a question you'd like to ask for the next video, sign up for the newsletter and you'll find the link in the welcome e-mail : http://eepurl.com/hFstpX

More FartThrob on the internet:
TikTok: Heartthrobert https://www.tiktok.com/@heartthrobert
Instagram: Heartthrobanderson https://www.instagram.com/heartthrobanderson/
Twitter: smartthrob https://twitter.com/smartthrob
